alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Pembina; Ramsey; Steele; Traill; Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 11:39PM CDT until September 05 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Benson County in northeastern North Dakota... Eastern Cavalier County in northeastern North Dakota... Grand Forks County in northeastern North Dakota... Nelson County in northeastern North Dakota... Northwestern Traill County in southeastern North Dakota... Griggs County in southeastern North Dakota... Ramsey County in northeastern North Dakota... Northern Barnes County in southeastern North Dakota... Walsh County in northeastern North Dakota... Eastern Eddy County in northeastern North Dakota... Steele County in southeastern North Dakota... Pembina County in northeastern North Dakota... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1139 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Derrick to near Whitman to near Finley, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grafton, Langdon, Grand Forks AFB, Park River, Larimore, Cavalier and Walhalla. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 148 and 192, and between mile markers 194 and 207. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant property damage.

area.areaDesc: Barnes; Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Pembina; Ramsey; Steele; Traill; Walsh
